title: Teaching nutrition: cross age tutoring
creator_credit: Gerben Cath, International Video Books and Victoria. Dept. of Health. Health Promotion Unit
brief_description: A short program for teachers to view before they become involved in nutrition education. It uses the cross age tutoring approach but the message is equally important regardless of the teaching strategies to be used. For both primary and secondary teachers.
creator_credit_for_label: Gerben Cath, International Video Books and Victoria. Dept. of Health. Health Promotion Unit
